channel.title: error in cleric spell list
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "error in cleric spell list"

item.title: Re: error in cleric spell list
item.content:encoded:
here's the list of changes that should be made (as far as i can tell):

cantrips
"Virtue" should be marked as UA
"Hand of radiance (UA)" and a page for it should be added

1st Level
Link to "Ceremony" should be added (XGtE)
"Guiding Hand" should be marked as UA

3rd level
following pages and links should be added:
"Life Transference" (XGtE)
"Fast Friends" (Acq Inc)
"Incite Greed" (Acq Inc)
"Motivational Speech" (Acq Inc)

5th level
following pages and links should be added:
"Dawn" (XGtE)
"Holy Weapon" (XGtE)

7th level
page and link for "Temple of the Gods" (XGtE) should be added

item.title: Re: error in cleric spell list
item.content:encoded: there are many more problems with that list. spells are missing, spells from unearthed arcana are not marked, it should be reworked basically.

item.title: error in cleric spell list
item.content:encoded: ceremony should be listed under the level 1 spells list.
